body_html:
After chatting IRL, I agree that the current change is not the right thing to do in general.

My bigger annoyance it that the warning shows by default on vanilla Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, which is a very common platform. There should be some way to avoid showing the warning in this common case, even if it doesn't apply in general.

body:
After chatting IRL, I agree that the current change is not the right thing to do in general.

My bigger annoyance it that the warning shows by default on vanilla Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, which is a very common platform. There should be some way to avoid showing the warning in this common case, even if it doesn't apply in general.
